languages.text: "Человек, который тебя воспитал, тоже был поверившим в сказочку глупцом? Его ты тоже использовал?"
"Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"
languages.original_text: "Человек, который тебя воспитал, тоже был поверившим в сказочку глупцом? Его ты тоже использовал?"

traits.locale_text: "Was the man who raised you also a fool who believed in a fancy story? Did you use him, too?"
"Was the man who raised you also a fool who believed in a fancy story? Did you use him, too?"
"Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"
"Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"
"Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"
"Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"

languages.text: "War der Mann, der Euch großgezogen hat, ebenso dumm, und hätte er auch so ein Märchen geglaubt? Habt Ihr ihn auch benutzt?"
languages.original_text: "Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"

traits.locale_text: "War der Mann, der Euch großgezogen hat, ebenso dumm, und hätte er auch so ein Märchen geglaubt? Habt Ihr ihn auch benutzt?"

languages.text: «¿Fue el hombre que te crio igual de estúpido y crédulo? ¿Le utilizaste a él también?».
languages.original_text: "Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Fue el hombre que te crio igual de estúpido y crédulo? ¿Le utilizaste a él también?».

languages.text: 「君の育ての親も同じようにバカで、おとぎ話を信じる性格か？彼のことも利用したのか？」
languages.original_text: "Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"

traits.locale_text: 「君の育ての親も同じようにバカで、おとぎ話を信じる性格か？彼のことも利用したのか？」

languages.text: “那个把你养大的人真的那么愚蠢，愚蠢到会相信童话故事吗？你是不是也利用了他？”
languages.original_text: "Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"

traits.locale_text: “那个把你养大的人真的那么愚蠢，愚蠢到会相信童话故事吗？你是不是也利用了他？”

languages.text: « L'homme qui vous a élevé était-il aussi stupide et susceptible de croire un conte de fées ? Vous êtes-vous aussi servi de lui ? »
languages.original_text: "Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"

traits.locale_text: « L'homme qui vous a élevé était-il aussi stupide et susceptible de croire un conte de fées ? Vous êtes-vous aussi servi de lui ? »

languages.text: "Seni yetiştiren adam da senin gibi peri masallarına inanan ahmağın teki miydi? Onu da kullandın mı?"
languages.original_text: "Was the man who raised you just as foolish and likely to believe in a fairy story? Did you use him, too?"
